Assigns productive forest for areas identified in the BC forest management land base indicator. Otherwise assigns NON_PRODUCTIVE_FOREST where for_mgmt_land_base_ind is N.

Assign the non-productive type Alpine Forest, and assign any rows in the forest management land base as Harvestable. If a row is both alpine forest and harvestable, alpine forest should take priority since the fact that it is harvestable is also indicated with the PRODUCTIVITY value PRODUCTIVE.
